ST.xhtml: topAir( config := config.topAir, temperature := temperatures.topAir, relativeHumidity := relativeHumidities.topAir); insideTube( config := config.insideTube, temperature := temperatures.insideTube, relativeHumidity := relativeHumidities.insideTube); statuses.healthStatus( isGood := (topAir.statuses.healthStatus.isGood OR topAir.statuses.enabledStatus.disabled) AND (insideTube.statuses.healthStatus.isGood OR insideTube.statuses.enabledStatus.disabled), hasWarning := topAir.statuses.healthStatus.hasWarning OR insideTube.statuses.healthStatus.hasWarning);

lock := THIS^.processes.lock.request();
